content.question: The quotation marks around the phrase “entertainment factor” imply that

choices.label: the measurement is largely personal and idiosyncratic
the measurement is not as important as other elements of the rating system
Chanu has little faith that his rating system is actually worthwhile
Chanu’s primary wish is to entertain his daughters

content.answer: the measurement is largely personal and idiosyncratic

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
